snx.framework.ui

Class UIComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • snx.framework.ui.UIComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIButton, UILabel

    public class UIComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    By Waffalz So using traditional Swing doesn't work with SNX, I'm gonna have to reinvent the wheel to suit SNX's needs. *sigh*
